    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [var]                                   1         3
    [a]                                     5         5
    [=]                                     7         7
    ["a"]                                   9         11
L2
    [var]                                   1         3
    [b]                                     5         5
    [=]                                     7         7
    ["b"]                                   9         11
L3
    [var]                                   1         3
    [c]                                     5         5
    [=]                                     7         7
    ["c"]                                   9         11
L4
    [var]                                   1         3
    [x]                                     5         5
    [=]                                     7         7
    ["$a(b: $b, c: \\"$c\\")"]              9         30
EOF
